name: U. P. Space
description:
Not the worst package delivery system in the galaxy! Travel through space while delivering different packages to earn cookies as a reward. 

Be careful though, our boss hates to pay for repairs so you are expected to make the ship last till the next ride, good luck on your new job, newbie.

Sorry But we don´t have a menu or pause system so to exit you´ll have to do (Alt + F4).

Credits:

Alvaro Saravia: Character Art, Environment Art

Abraham Martínez: Environment Art
